description:
The Black Diamond Transfer Shovel helps you throw as much snow as possible from the smallest footprint. Its durable, smooth-bottom blade give you clean walls in your snow pit and the versatile design works well in any backcountry situation.

  • Extendable two-piece aluminum shaft
  • T-grip provides good leverage
  • Ultra-strong lightweight aluminum blade
  • Riveted shovel blade bites into hard snow and debris
  • Surface area of 590cm² moves snow quickly
  • Extended length is 79cm, collapsed length is 61cm
name: Black Diamond Transfer Shovel
